message.body: Chris, I don't know if you agree with me, but I really don't approve of Chris's decision to push rehearsal to 11 to host a glee club party in the room. Am I overreacting?
Nevermind forget it I need to take a chill pill
When did he push rehearsal to 11?
There was a miscommunication when he asked me to clean the room and I declined; he said rehearsal would be moved to 11, but meant something else
Please ignore everything I said--I should just keep my opinion between him and me
Why would he ask you to clean the room and not the freshmen?
But rehearsal is still at 10:30, right?
He is having Franklyn do it--the oter freshmen are in glee club. It is.
I'm sorry I am so impulsive please promise to forget my outlast
Haha, don't worry about it Quinton. I would have felt the same way.
